entry.title: Kamagio Snack 32oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kamagio
Type:
Price: 29.99 - 39.99 (22 variants)

Bullet Points

  • Durable & Safe – Made from premium food-grade stainless steel, BPA-free and built to last.
  • Temperature Control – Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps drinks hot or cold for up to 24 hours.
  • Leak-Proof Lid – Features a foldable spout for convenient, hygienic sipping on the go.
  • Smart Design – Includes two detachable bottom containers for snacks, pet food, or small essentials.
  • Versatile Use – Perfect for work, travel, sports, kids, or pets.

Product Description
The KAMAGIO Snack 32oz (950 ml) combines premium materials with a smart, multifunctional design. Its double-wall stainless steel insulation maintains the perfect temperature for your drinks, while the flip spout lid ensures easy, spill-free hydration anywhere. The two detachable bottom compartments provide extra storage for snacks, pet treats, or small items. Whether you’re heading to work, the gym, or an outdoor adventure, this bottle keeps you and your companions refreshed and ready to go.

Product Description

The KAMAGIO Kids Tumbler is a 14oz (420ml) stainless steel cup designed for toddlers and children. With its vacuum insulation, it keeps drinks hot or cold for up to 24 hours, making it perfect for school, travel, and everyday use. The eco-friendly, powder-coated design is durable and easy to clean, while the included straw and handle make drinking comfortable for little hands. Available in multiple kid-friendly colors, this tumbler is both functional and fun, helping children stay hydrated throughout the day.

entry.title: Kamagio Fun 18oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kamagio
Type:
Price: 24.99 - 34.99 (4 variants)

Bullet Points

  1. Perfect for Kids – 500 ml stainless steel vacuum flask with straw and handle, lightweight and easy to carry to school, on trips, or for sports activities.
  2. Excellent Thermal Insulation – double-wall vacuum technology keeps drinks hot or cold for 12–24 hours.
  3. Safe and Eco-Friendly – made of high-quality stainless steel, BPA-free, durable, and reusable.
  4. Practical Design – screw lid and straw make drinking easy, handle ensures easy carrying.
  5. Two Fun Colors – available in two cheerful color options, perfect for everyday use or as a gift.

Product Description

The KAMAGIO Kids Vacuum Flask 18 oz / 500 ml is specially designed for children. Thanks to its double-wall vacuum insulation, it keeps drinks hot or cold for up to 24 hours, making it ideal for school, trips, or sports activities.

Made from BPA-free stainless steel, the flask is safe, durable, and eco-friendly. The convenient straw and handle make drinking and carrying easy. Available in two fun colors, this thermos is both functional and playful, helping children stay hydrated throughout the day.
